LogWriter
public class FileLogWriter
extends StreamLogWriter

A class for writing the kernel log to a file.

              throws java.io.IOException,
                     LogException
Create a file log writer and open it for writing.

Parameters:
name - The name of the file to write to.

java.io.IOException - If the log file cannot be opened.
LogException - If the log cannot be written.
